https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hQoJd5YlT4IkDcQ12aWi9mNKw0u.jpg Blowtorch is the Brooklyn story of Ann Willis, a recently widowed and financially struggling, mother of three. When her oldest son is murdered, she inexorably takes the investigation into her own hands. Blowtorch
